fountain.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a structure from which water is pushed up into the air, used for example as decoration in a garden or park
fountain.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a flow of liquid, or of something bright and colourful that goes straight up into the air
fountain.translation[0].definitions[1].e: A fountain of blood was pouring from his chest.
A fountain of sparks shot high into the sky.
